Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.


What is Marketing?

  • Definition: Marketing is the process of identifying customer needs, creating products or services that fulfill those needs, and communicating the value of those offerings to potential customers.

  • Focus: Marketing focuses on getting the right message to the right audience, ultimately driving interest and sales.

  • Key Activities:

    • Market research

    • Product development

    • Brand building

    • Advertising and promotions

    • Content creation

    • Customer relationship management


What is Marketing Management?

  • Definition: Marketing management is the strategic and operational process of planning, organizing, implementing, and controlling an organization's marketing resources and activities.

  • Focus: Marketing management aims to create a cohesive marketing plan, optimize resource allocation, and measure the effectiveness of marketing initiatives.

  • Key Activities:

    • Developing marketing strategies and plans

    • Setting marketing budgets

    • Managing marketing teams

    • Overseeing marketing campaigns

    • Analyzing marketing performance (tracking metrics and ROI)

    • Making adjustments to strategies as needed


The Relationship Between Marketing and Marketing Management

Think of marketing as the actions you take to promote your business, and marketing management as the overarching system to plan, execute, and refine those actions strategically.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in marketing and business

courseDetails.title: Scenario Planning Mastery: Visualizing Alternative Futures
courseDetails.shortDescription: Add a valuable strategic technique to your toolkit: Foreseeing how your future "business landscape" could change
courseDetails.longDescription:
The aim of this course is to help you visualize – and understand – alternative futures that could unfold for your business, project, product, industry - or entire country.

It is based on the course in scenario planning I teach in the Master's program in Future Foresight and Planning at Rochester Institute of Technology's Dubai campus – but with some extra content added which comes from my practical experience as a scenario generation workshop facilitator in over 30 countries, and from my bestselling books on this fascinating technique.

Why should you want to visualize your future? Because as a decision maker, you need to understand not just that the future will be different (we all know this), but how the future will be different – specifically, the future “business landscape” for your organization.

The reason this is so important is that you have to make decisions and plans today that will only play out at some point in the future – a future that right now is unknowable.  And even though we can't confidently predict exactly how the future is going to turn out, the success of your organization may depend on how good those decisions and plans are, how well-aligned they are with the way the future has actually unfolded.  Like it or not, though, you often have no choice but to make these decisions well before you know what the future terrain will in fact look like in which they will be implemented.

Scenario planning is a highly practical technique to foresee how this future business landscape could evolve – and potentially in different directions. It is not about predicting the future but exploring alternative futures – each of which could realistically emerge. Its practical value is clear: by helping you foresee different ways your particular market or business terrain could change, you're in a better position to make effective long-term plans today.

This Udemy course walks you step-by-step through the process of generating future scenarios for an organization, a product, an industry – even an entire country. The process is structured and logical, and yet very creative.

Join me for an eye-opening learning experience! I guarantee it will add a very valuable technique to your managerial toolkit.
targetAudiences: Anyone with (co-)responsibility for the future success of an organization of any kind
Strategy or planning professionals
Marketing professionals
Business owners, entrepreneurs, founders or investors in a start-up
Students of business or economics

Operations management (OM) is the administration of business practices to create the highest level of efficiency possible within an organization. It is concerned with converting materials and labor into goods and services as efficiently as possible to maximize the profit of an organization. OM covers all aspects of a business, from the design and management of products, services, and processes, to the management of supply chains and logistics.


Importance of Operations Management Skills for Career and Business:

Developing skills in operations management can significantly benefit your career and entrepreneurial endeavors in the following ways:

Career:

  • Enhanced Employability: Operations management skills are highly sought after in various industries, including manufacturing, healthcare, technology, retail, and service sectors. Expertise in OM can open up a wide range of career opportunities, such as operations manager, supply chain analyst, production planner, quality manager, project manager, and more.

  • Increased Earning Potential: Professionals with strong operations management skills often command higher salaries due to their ability to optimize processes, reduce costs, improve efficiency, and drive overall business success.

  • Problem-Solving and Decision-Making Abilities: Operations management equips you with the skills to analyze complex problems, identify bottlenecks, and make data-driven decisions that lead to improved operational performance. These skills are valuable assets for any career path.


Business management is the process of planning, organizing, directing, and controlling the resources (financial, human, and material) within an organization to achieve its goals and objectives effectively and efficiently. It encompasses a wide range of activities, from setting strategic direction and making operational decisions to managing resources and leading people.


Importance of Learning Linked Topics:

  • Business Models and Value Propositions: Understanding how businesses create, deliver, and capture value is crucial for identifying opportunities, developing new products or services, and ensuring long-term sustainability.

  • Strategic Management and Planning: This involves setting long-term goals, analyzing the competitive environment, and developing strategies to achieve success. Strong strategic thinking is essential for making informed decisions and guiding the organization towards its vision.

  • Organizational Behavior and Leadership: Effective leaders understand how to motivate and inspire teams, manage conflict, and create a positive work environment. Knowledge of organizational behavior is key to building high-performing teams and fostering a culture of innovation.

  • Risk Management and Business Continuity Planning: Businesses face a variety of risks, from financial and operational disruptions to natural disasters. Risk management involves identifying potential threats, assessing their impact, and implementing strategies to mitigate or avoid them. Business continuity planning ensures that critical operations can continue in the event of a disruption.

  • Change Management and Organizational Development: Organizations must continuously adapt to remain competitive. Change management skills are essential for leading and managing change initiatives effectively, while organizational development focuses on improving the overall performance and effectiveness of the organization.

  • Corporate Governance and Compliance: This involves ensuring that the organization operates ethically, transparently, and in accordance with relevant laws and regulations. Strong corporate governance practices build trust with stakeholders and protect the organization's reputation.


By developing a comprehensive understanding of business management and related topics, you'll gain the knowledge and skills necessary to build a successful career, make a positive impact, and contribute to the growth and development of your organization.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in business

courseDetails.title: Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática ("Machine Learning"), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico, e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, membro da Câmara Portuguesa de Comércio e Indústria.

O MTF está presente em 208 países e foi escolhido por mais de 420 000 alunos.


Autora do Curso:

Alex Amoroso é uma profissional experiente com uma sólida formação académica e empresarial, especializada em metodologias de investigação, formulação de estratégias, e desenvolvimento de produtos. Doutorada pela Faculdade de Ciências Sociais e Políticas de Lisboa, Portugal, onde foi Aprovada com Distinção e Louvor pela sua investigação exemplar, Alex Amoroso traz consigo um vasto conhecimento e experiência.

Para além dos seus estudos de doutoramento, a Doutora Amoroso tem atuado como Professora Convidada, ministrando cursos a uma vasta gama de estudantes desde a licenciatura até alunos de cursos profissionais e executivos. Atualmente, na EIMT em Zurique, Suíça, leciona para doutorandos, oferecendo instrução avançada em desenho e metodologias de investigação. No Instituto MTF, a Doutora Amoroso lidera a área académica de Desenvolvimento de Produto.

Em sinergia entre a experiência académica e empresarial, a Doutora Amoroso alcançou elevados resultados na sua carreira profissional, liderando atividades de I&D, desenvolvimento de produtos, desenvolvimento estratégico, e análise de mercado num vasto leque de empresas. Implementou as melhores práticas de mercado em setores que vão da Banca e Finanças, ao PropTech, Consultoria e Investigação, e Startups Inovadoras.

A extensa produção científica de Alex Amoroso inclui numerosos artigos publicados em revistas conceituadas, bem como apresentações orais e posters em conferências internacionais. Os resultados da sua investigação têm sido apresentados em instituições de renome como a Faculdade de Ciências Políticas e Sociais e a Stressed Out Conference na UCL, entre outras.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso em impulsionar mudanças positivas, Alex Amoroso dedica-se a capacitar alunos e profissionais para a utilização de metodologias de vanguarda para alcançar a excelência no mundo empresarial global.


Objetivos do Curso:

● Dotar-vos de conhecimentos e competências para uma eficaz tomada de decisão

● Enfatizar a inovação centrada no ser humano e o conhecimento executável

● Abordagem multidisciplinar para a inovação e desenvolvimento de produtos


O que são Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos?

As metodologias de investigação em estratégia e desenvolvimento de produtos são as abordagens e ferramentas estruturadas utilizadas para recolher, analisar e interpretar informação que apoia planos estratégicos e a criação de produtos. Garantem que as decisões estão enraizadas em provas e nas necessidades dos clientes, e não em suposições.


Principais Focos das Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

● Estudo de Mercado: Compreender a dimensão, tendências, concorrência e oportunidades dentro de um mercado ou indústria específica.

● Investigação de Clientes: Investigar as necessidades, pontos problemáticos, comportamentos e preferências do seu público-alvo.

● Análise da Concorrência: Avaliar os pontos fortes, fracos, estratégias e quota de mercado dos concorrentes.

● Análise de Tendências: Identificar padrões emergentes, tecnologias, ou preferências dos clientes que possam moldar o futuro.

● Análise Interna: Analisar os pontos fortes, fraquezas, capacidades e recursos de uma empresa para informar a estratégia.

● Teste de Conceito de Produto: Recolher feedback sobre ideias de produtos propostas numa fase inicial do processo de desenvolvimento.

● Teste de Usabilidade: Avaliar se um produto é fácil e intuitivo de usar.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

courseDetails.title: Google NotebookLM
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Google NotebookLM: AI-Powered Research, Productivity Enhancement & Real-World Applications
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you a student, researcher, or business professional looking to optimize your research workflows and manage information more efficiently? Do you want to leverage cutting-edge AI tools to organize, synthesize, and analyze data seamlessly? This course is your ultimate guide to mastering Google NotebookLM, Google's innovative AI-powered research assistant.

Whether you are new to AI-powered productivity tools or a seasoned researcher eager to stay ahead, this course will equip you with the skills and techniques to harness the full potential of NotebookLM for improved research efficiency and organization.

In this course, you will:

  • Understand the fundamentals of Google NotebookLM and how it fits into modern research and information management.

  • Explore the key features that make NotebookLM a powerful productivity tool, including content synthesis, note organization, and real-time research assistance.

  • Learn to conduct research with NotebookLM, utilizing AI-generated insights to enhance your work efficiency.

  • Dive into technical insights through a detailed studio overview and a breakdown of the core technological aspects of NotebookLM.

  • Identify practical challenges by understanding the limitations of NotebookLM and discovering how to overcome them.

  • Apply your knowledge to real-world scenarios with case studies that demonstrate how NotebookLM enhances research and productivity.

Why learn Google NotebookLM?

In today’s fast-paced world, information overload can hinder productivity and innovation. Google NotebookLM empowers users to overcome this challenge by using AI to streamline research, organize notes, and synthesize information effectively. By mastering this tool, you can stay ahead in your academic, business, or creative pursuits. Whether you're compiling data for research projects, drafting strategic reports, or analyzing industry trends, NotebookLM offers features that save time and boost productivity.

courseDetails.title: Cybersecurity and Ethical Hacking in Hindi (हिन्दी)

क्या आप एक उभरते हुए Cybersecurity प्रोफेशनल हैं, दिल से एक Ethical Hacker हैं, या Digital Security की छिपी दुनिया से आकर्षित हैं? कल्पना करें कि आपके पास सिस्टम को सुरक्षित रखने, डेटा को प्रोटेक्ट करने और साइबर थ्रेट्स को रोकने की क्षमता है। यह कोर्स, "Cybersecurity and Ethical Hacking in Hindi (हिन्दी)" आपको शुरुआती स्तर से एक कुशल Cybersecurity Expert बनाने के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया है, जिससे आप आज की टेक-ड्रिवन दुनिया में सिस्टम और डेटा को सुरक्षित रखने के लिए आवश्यक नॉलेज और प्रैक्टिकल स्किल्स हासिल कर सकते हैं।

इस कोर्स में, आप Cybersecurity और Ethical Hacking के हर पहलू में गहराई से जाएंगे, जिसमें एक Secure Virtual Lab सेटअप करना, Hands-on Pen Testing, Vulnerability Assessments, Social Engineering, और Threat Detection में AI का इंटीग्रेशन शामिल है। आप प्रैक्टिकल, रियल-वर्ल्ड एक्टिविटीज के माध्यम से Cybersecurity Principles, Tools और Best Practices की गहरी समझ बनाएंगे।

इस कोर्स में, आप:

VMware, Kali Linux, Metasploitable 2 और अन्य का उपयोग करके एक Complete Virtual Lab Environment सेटअप करना सीखेंगे, ताकि आप अपनी स्किल्स को सुरक्षित रूप से प्रैक्टिस कर सकें।

Ethical Hacking की Essentials को मास्टर करेंगे, जिसमें Hacking के विभिन्न Phases, CIA और DAD Triads, Zero Trust और Compliance Standards शामिल हैं।

विभिन्न Anonymity Tools और Online Identities को Secure करने के Methods का अन्वेषण करेंगे, जिसमें VPNs, Proxies, और TOR शामिल हैं।

In-depth Passive Information Gathering करेंगे, और Whois, BuiltWith, NMAP, और Google Dorks जैसे Tools के बारे में जानेंगे।

VAPT (Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing) और OWASP पर फोकस करके Vulnerabilities का Analysis और Reporting करेंगे।

Pen Testing में भाग लेंगे और Web Applications में SQL Injections, Command Injections, और XSS Vulnerabilities को पहचानेंगे।

Burp Suite, SQLMap, John the Ripper, Nessus, और Metasploit जैसे Popular Hacking Tools के साथ Hands-on Experience प्राप्त करेंगे।

विभिन्न Malware के खिलाफ प्रोटेक्ट करेंगे, Virus, Spyware, Trojans के प्रकार को समझेंगे, और Malware Detection और Removal करेंगे।

AI-Driven Cybersecurity Strategies सीखेंगे, Threat Detection से लेकर Automated Response Systems और Cybersecurity में AI के Ethical Implications तक।

साइबर थ्रेट्स के लगातार विकसित होने के कारण, Cybersecurity का ज्ञान आज की Digital Landscape में किसी के लिए भी महत्वपूर्ण है। यह कोर्स आपको एक कंट्रोल्ड एनवायरनमेंट में Real-World Hacking Techniques का अभ्यास करने, Cybercriminals की Mentality को समझने और Digital Threats के खिलाफ अपनी डिफेंस को मजबूत करने का अवसर देता है।

इस कोर्स के दौरान, आप Practical Exercises, Case Studies, और Hands-on Hacking Labs पर काम करेंगे, जो आपको Real-World Cybersecurity Skills विकसित करने में मदद करेंगे। एक एक्सपीरियंस्ड इंस्ट्रक्टर द्वारा गाइडेड, आप इंडस्ट्री के Best Practices और Advanced Topics पर इनसाइट्स प्राप्त करेंगे, जिसमें Cybersecurity में AI का उपयोग भी शामिल है।

Cybersecurity expert बनने के लिए तैयार हैं? अभी एनरोल करें और Ethical Hacking और Cybersecurity की Dynamic और Rewarding World में अपनी यात्रा शुरू करें!
targetAudiences: Aspiring Cybersecurity Professionals जो Ethical Hacking और System Protection में प्रैक्टिकल स्किल्स हासिल करना चाहते हैं।

You will know about: what is coaching, its types, components, rules; skills and competencies of coaches, how to proceed a coaching session and coaching methods and tools. After finishing a course you will get: key knowledge about coaching and how to implement it in effective ways


The Crucial Role of Coaching Techniques in Managerial Leadership and Career Development

The role of a manager goes far beyond traditional tasks of overseeing operations and ensuring productivity. A successful manager is now expected to act as a leader, a mentor, and a coach, guiding their team members towards individual and collective success. This paradigm shift highlights the significance of coaching techniques in the realm of managerial responsibilities.


The Transformation of Managerial Roles

Evolving Leadership Expectations

The traditional image of a manager as a stern authority figure has given way to a more holistic view of leadership. Managers are now expected to serve as role models, motivators, and mentors to their teams. This shift stems from the recognition that employees perform at their best when they feel valued, supported, and empowered.

The evolution of leadership expectations can be traced back to the changing dynamics of the modern workplace. In the past, managers were primarily responsible for enforcing rules and ensuring productivity. However, as organizations began to realize that employee engagement and satisfaction were crucial for success, a transformation in managerial roles ensued.

Today, managers are not just tasked with overseeing tasks and projects; they are expected to inspire and empower their teams. This shift is partly a response to the changing nature of work itself. In a knowledge-based economy, where creativity, innovation, and adaptability are paramount, traditional top-down management no longer suffices.


Coaching as a Leadership Skill

Coaching has emerged as a pivotal leadership skill that fosters personal and professional growth. We'll explore how coaching techniques, such as active listening, constructive feedback, and goal-setting, can empower managers to become effective leaders who inspire and guide their teams towards excellence.

Coaching is not a one-size-fits-all approach; it is a dynamic and personalized method of leadership. Effective coaches adapt their style to the needs and preferences of individual team members. They actively listen to understand the unique challenges and aspirations of each employee, fostering a sense of trust and rapport.

Moreover, coaching is not merely about providing solutions but guiding employees to discover answers themselves. This approach instills a sense of ownership and accountability in team members. It encourages them to take the initiative, think critically, and develop problem-solving skills—a valuable asset in today's fast-paced, ever-changing business landscape.

Coaching also plays a crucial role in setting and achieving goals. Effective managers use coaching techniques to collaboratively define clear, actionable objectives with their team members. This process not only aligns individual efforts with organizational goals but also empowers employees to track their progress and make necessary adjustments along the way.


Coaching Knowledge for Career Development

Career Development in the Modern Workplace

Career development is a top priority for employees. Discover how coaching knowledge equips managers with the tools to help team members navigate their career paths, set meaningful goals, and continually improve their skills.

Career development has evolved from being a peripheral concern to a central focus in the modern workplace. In an era marked by rapid technological advancements and industry disruptions, employees recognize the importance of continuous learning and skill enhancement to remain relevant and competitive.

This heightened emphasis on career development places managers at the forefront of helping their team members chart their professional journeys. Coaching knowledge equips managers with the ability to provide guidance that is not only aligned with the organization's needs but also tailored to the aspirations of individual employees.

One of the key advantages of coaching in career development is its ability to facilitate self-awareness. Effective coaches help employees identify their strengths, weaknesses, interests, and values. Armed with this self-knowledge, employees can make informed career decisions that align with their passions and long-term goals.


The Manager as a Career Development Partner

Explore the responsibilities of middle and top managers in preparing and mentoring personal development plans for their team members. Learn how these plans can align with organizational objectives and create a win-win situation for both employees and the company.

Managers who actively engage in career development become indispensable partners in their employees' professional growth. They play a pivotal role in creating personalized development plans that leverage individual strengths and address areas needing improvement.

These development plans not only benefit the employees but also the organization. By aligning individual development goals with the company's strategic objectives, managers ensure that every team member's growth contributes to the overall success of the business.

Furthermore, coaching techniques are instrumental in fostering a growth mindset within teams. Managers can use coaching to encourage employees to embrace challenges, persist in the face of setbacks, and view failures as opportunities for learning and improvement. This mindset shift has a profound impact on team performance and innovation.


Coaching for Internal Education and Employee Development

The Role of Managers in Internal Education

Managers often bear the responsibility of nurturing a culture of learning within their teams and organizations. Explore how coaching methods can be instrumental in identifying and addressing skill gaps, fostering innovation, and supporting ongoing employee development.

Organizations that prioritize learning and development gain a competitive edge. Managers are at the forefront of this initiative, serving as the catalysts for continuous improvement and innovation within their teams.

Coaching methods play a pivotal role in identifying and addressing skill gaps. By regularly assessing the competencies of their team members, managers can tailor training and development programs to bridge these gaps effectively. This proactive approach not only enhances individual skills but also bolsters the organization's overall capabilities.

Moreover, coaching encourages a culture of innovation. Effective coaches inspire creativity and critical thinking in their teams. They challenge employees to question the status quo, explore new ideas, and experiment with novel approaches. In this way, managers act as innovation champions, driving progress and adaptability.


Coaching as a Tool for Employee Empowerment

Employee empowerment is a cornerstone of effective leadership. Coaching techniques provide managers with the tools to empower their team members by fostering a sense of ownership and autonomy in their roles.

One of the primary ways coaching empowers employees is by promoting self-directed learning. Instead of relying solely on formal training programs, employees learn to identify their development needs and take initiative in seeking resources and opportunities for growth. Managers who coach effectively encourage this proactive approach.

Furthermore, coaching cultivates a growth-oriented mindset among employees. When team members receive regular feedback, both positive and constructive, they become more receptive to continuous improvement. They view challenges as opportunities for growth and development, which ultimately leads to higher levels of engagement and performance.

By creating an environment where continuous learning is celebrated, managers inspire their teams to thrive in an ever-changing business landscape. This culture of learning becomes a strategic advantage for organizations, as it enables them to adapt quickly to new challenges and opportunities.


Coaching for Mental Health and Well-being

The Manager as a Trusted Support System

For many employees, especially those who live alone or lack a strong support network, a manager can become their most trusted confidant. Understand how coaching methods extend beyond professional development to support the mental health and well-being of team members.

The relationship between a manager and their team members extends beyond the confines of the workplace. In some cases, a manager may be the primary source of support for an employee, especially when they are facing personal challenges or seeking guidance related to their mental health and well-being.

Coaching methods are not limited to career development; they encompass the whole spectrum of an employee's life. Effective managers create an environment where team members feel comfortable discussing personal challenges and seeking guidance when needed. This trust and openness are essential for maintaining employee well-being.

In situations where employees are dealing with stress, anxiety, or other mental health issues, managers with coaching skills can provide valuable support. They can listen empathetically, offer guidance on stress management techniques, and help employees access appropriate resources for professional help when necessary.


Coaching for Life Questions and Personal Challenges

Life is filled with complexities, and employees often grapple with personal challenges that can affect their work performance and overall well-being. Managers who are skilled in coaching can offer valuable guidance during these times of need.

One area where coaching is particularly beneficial is work-life balance. In today's fast-paced world, employees often struggle to juggle their professional and personal responsibilities. Managers can use coaching techniques to help team members set boundaries, manage their time effectively, and achieve a healthier work-life balance.

Coaching also proves invaluable in navigating interpersonal relationships, both within and outside the workplace. Managers can offer insights into effective communication, conflict resolution, and building positive relationships, which can significantly impact an employee's overall quality of life.

In times of personal crisis or uncertainty, such as major life transitions or unexpected challenges, employees may turn to their managers for guidance. Managers trained in coaching can provide a supportive and non-judgmental space for employees to explore their feelings, identify potential solutions, and develop action plans to address these challenges.


In conclusion, coaching techniques have become indispensable in the modern workplace, particularly within the roles of managers and leaders. These skills not only drive career development and internal education but also play a crucial role in supporting the mental health and well-being of employees.

As we navigate an ever-changing professional landscape, organizations that recognize the importance of coaching will not only foster a culture of continuous improvement but also cultivate a loyal and motivated workforce. Managers who embrace coaching as a core aspect of their leadership style will not only elevate their own careers but also become catalysts for the success of their teams and organizations as a whole.

By understanding and implementing coaching techniques effectively, managers can truly transform the workplace into an environment where individuals thrive, careers flourish, and holistic well-being is nurtured.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build the career at management, coaching, mentorship or get to know themselves better, for people working in helping areas, for coaches.

CSS And Javascript Crash Course

1)  Learn CSS Crash Course

This course shows you how to create CSS classes from a beginner's level. It starts off with basic HTML declarations, properties, values, and how to include a CSS style sheet with your HTML code. For those of you who are new to CSS and HTML, we show you step-by-step how to create a CSS file and include it in your HTML code, even if you use a cloud server for your hosting.

  • We show you how to position your elements, layout your elements relative to your documents, and style your HTML using predefined CSS values. We introduce you to the common CSS styling that you'll need when you start off designing your pages. If you want to get to know CSS and website design, this course is meant for you, and it can be used by anyone who hasn't even seen one line of CSS code yet. We focus on the latest CSS 3 and HTML 5 standards, so you get the latest when coding your website pages instead of focusing on older code.

  • There are no prerequisites. Anyone Can join this course. It is recommended though that individual have some basic computer programming knowledge.

Learn Javascript Programming

Welcome to “The ultimate guide for beginners in photo editing” course on Skylum’s Udemy Channel.


Designed for aspiring photographers and editing enthusiasts, this course is your gateway to the fascinating world of photo editing. Whether you're a complete novice or have some basic knowledge, this course will equip you with the essential skills to transform your photo into stunning works of art.


Throughout the course, you will gain a comprehensive theoretical background on editing, learning about its different stages, exploring the main existing software and applications, and discovering various editing styles. By the end of the course, you will have a solid understanding of the editing process and be able to apply different techniques to enhance your photos.

You will explore all the basic points of photo editing, main techniques, stages, and principles. The main ways your business can benefit from photo editing are also covered in this section.


Software for Editing Photos

In this section, we will also focus on Luminar Neo and tell you why it’s worth using if you want to level up your photo-editing skills.

In this section, we'll introduce you to the most popular photo-editing software programs and mobile apps. You'll learn how to choose the right tools for your needs, and we'll take a deep dive into the next level of photo editing with Luminar Neo.

courseDetails.title: Wedding Consultant Masterclass
courseDetails.shortDescription: A Comprehensive Guide to Planning, Designing, and Managing Weddings Like a Professional Consultant
courseDetails.longDescription:
If you have a passion for weddings and a keen eye for detail, this Wedding Consultant Masterclass is the perfect course to help you turn that passion into a rewarding career. Designed for aspiring and established wedding planners, this course provides a step-by-step guide to planning, coordinating, and managing weddings from start to finish.

A successful wedding consultant is more than just an event planner. They are a problem-solver, a budget manager, a creative visionary, and, most importantly, a trusted guide for couples on one of the most important days of their lives. This course equips you with the knowledge, tools, and industry secrets to excel in this role. You will gain a deep understanding of wedding planning fundamentals, from selecting the perfect venue and managing budgets to coordinating with vendors and creating a seamless wedding day timeline.

Beyond the basics, this masterclass dives into the art of wedding design and décor, helping you bring a couple’s vision to life through themes, color palettes, floral arrangements, and customized details. You'll also learn essential business and marketing strategies to attract clients, build a strong brand, and establish a reputation as a top-tier wedding consultant. Whether you want to work independently or join an event planning firm, this course will provide you with a solid foundation to thrive in the wedding industry.

We’ll also cover contract negotiation, financial planning, crisis management, and legal considerations, ensuring that you’re fully prepared for the real-world challenges of wedding consulting. From handling last-minute changes to making sure every detail is executed flawlessly, this course teaches you how to manage weddings with professionalism, creativity, and efficiency.

By the end of this program, you will have the expertise to plan and execute unforgettable weddings, create meaningful client relationships, and build a sustainable and profitable career in wedding consulting. Whether you're just starting out or looking to refine your skills, this masterclass will give you the confidence and expertise to excel in the wedding industry.

Start your journey today and take the first step toward becoming a highly successful Wedding Consultant!
targetAudiences: Wedding Consultant or anyone who have the interest in Wedding Consultancy

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear un Blog con WordPress y ChatGPT Desde Cero 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear un blog con WordPress y ChatGPT desde cero, de forma fácil y simple, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UN BLOG WEB CON WORPDRESS Y CHATGPT PARA GENERAR INGRESOS POR INTERNET?

WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


ChatGPT es un sistema de chat basado en el modelo de lenguaje por Inteligencia Artificial GPT-3, desarrollado por la empresa OpenAI. Es un modelo con más de 175 millones de parámetros, y entrenado con grandes cantidades de texto para realizar tareas relacionadas con el lenguaje, desde la traducción hasta la generación de texto.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un blog con WordPress,  también utilizaremos la plataforma de ChatGPT que nos brindará el apoyo y la información necesaria para diseñar nuestro blog en WordPress, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su blog con WordPress y ChatGPT, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su blog diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu blog con WordPress y ChatGPT.

  • Cómo instalar WordPress y un certificado SSL para tu dominio.

  • Cómo crear blogs profesionales con WordPress y ChatGPT desde cero.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu blog de forma profesional con la ayuda de ChatGPT.

  • Cómo crear el contenido de tu blog con la ayuda de ChatGPT.

  • Cómo crear artículos para tu blog con la ayuda de ChatGPT.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de contacto para tu blog.

  • Cómo adaptar tu blog para dispositivos móviles (tablets y celulares).


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear un Blog con WordPress y ChatGPT Desde Cero", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 180,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un blog con WordPress y ChatGPT de forma rápida y sencilla.


¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender con WordPress y ChatGPT.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Renato Yacolca

Learn with Real-Life Examples

Learning is easier when you can see how things work. That’s why this course is full of real-life examples. React is a Top JavaScript library for building interactive web applications, because of its fast performance, scalability and ease of use.

Course updates

  • March 2025. Added “AI CHATBOT” module. Build a real-time AI Chatbot with React.js, ChatGPT, Gemini AI & DeepSeek (2.5 hours).

  • February 2025. Added “TO-DO LIST” module. Build a functional To-Do List using Forms, Data Validation & API Integration (4 hours).

About this course

  • I will teach you React from the very beginning by building a real web project on practice.

  • This is a crash practical course made with Love. It won't take too much of your time.

  • To make learning easier for you, I will explain React concept in the simplest way possible.


What's in this course?

1) BASIC Module (3 hours)

Learn the Core Skills of React. Work through Practical Examples

  • Understand React key concepts: JSX, DOM, Virtual DOM, Component-Based Architecture.

  • Set up development environment (Browser, VS Code Editor, Node.js, npm).

  • Debug React applications using Developer Tools.

  • Create Components and write JSX markup. Import & Export Components.

  • Share Data between Components via Props and Events. Conditional rendering.

  • Styling components via Inline Styles, CSS Files and CSS Modules. Alternative Approaches.

  • Understand Component Life-Cycle. Props vs State vs Variables.

2) TO-DO LIST Module (4 hours)

Build a functional To-Do List using Forms, Data Validation & API Integration

  • Set up React application via Vite.

  • Handle Form Submission, store Form Data in the Component State.

  • Render Lists in React. Controlled and Uncontrolled Components.

  • Implement Filtering, Editing and Deleting List Items. Handle Input Fields Changes.

  • Form Data Validation, Errors Handling via react-hook-form and yup libraries.

  • API interaction via fetch and axios library. HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE).

  • Organizing of API calls. Handle API error mesages. Add Loading Spinner.

  • Create and using of React Custom Hooks. Using useEffect hook.

3) AI CHATBOT Module (2.5 hours)

Build a real-time AI Chatbot with React.js, ChatGPT, Gemini AI & DeepSeek

  • Generative AI and Pricing Models for popular AI API’s.

  • Create and style Chatbot Layout. Handle Chat Interactions via Component State.

  • Overview of ChatGPT, Gemini and DeepSeek AI Models.

  • Getting API keys for AI API’s and Connect AI Models the for Chatting.

  • Implement Streaming Messages. Handle and Debug API’s Errors.

  • Add support of Dark Mode, Markdown, Messages Auto-Scrolling and Auto-Resizable Inputs.

4) BONUS Module ( 1 hour)

Learn about effective team collaboration, task estimation, productivity, problem solving, code review, developers salaries and much more. Improve your development of Soft-Skills.

Meet your instructor!

Dmytro Vasyliev - Senior Front-end Engineer with more than 10 years of professional experience in developing complex Web Applications. I have extensive experience with React and other frameworks, having used it in various projects to build dynamic and efficient user interfaces.

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. Dr. Joao Martins is seasoned manager and entrepreneur, with over 30 years’ experience in top management positions in the telecommunications and IT sectors. Operations management (OM) is the administration of business practices to create the highest level of efficiency possible within an organization. It is concerned with converting materials and labor into goods and services as efficiently as possible to maximize the profit of an organization. OM covers all aspects of a business, from the design and management of products, services, and processes, to the management of supply chains and logistics.


Importance of Operations Management Skills for Career and Business:

Developing skills in operations management can significantly benefit your career and entrepreneurial endeavors in the following ways:

Career:

  • Enhanced Employability: Operations management skills are highly sought after in various industries, including manufacturing, healthcare, technology, retail, and service sectors. Expertise in OM can open up a wide range of career opportunities, such as operations manager, supply chain analyst, production planner, quality manager, project manager, and more.

  • Increased Earning Potential: Professionals with strong operations management skills often command higher salaries due to their ability to optimize processes, reduce costs, improve efficiency, and drive overall business success.

  • Problem-Solving and Decision-Making Abilities: Operations management equips you with the skills to analyze complex problems, identify bottlenecks, and make data-driven decisions that lead to improved operational performance. These skills are valuable assets for any career path.


Digital Transformation. In business landscape, digital transformation has become a critical strategic imperative for companies across all industries. This program aims to provide participants with a deep understanding of digital technologies, their impact on businesses, and effective strategies for leveraging them to drive growth and innovation.


Importance of Education in Digital Transformation for Companies and Managers:

In the  business environment, digital transformation has emerged as a key driver of competitive advantage and long-term success. Embracing digital technologies is no longer an option but a necessity for companies to remain relevant and thrive. However, implementing digital transformation initiatives requires more than just adopting new tools; it demands a comprehensive understanding of digital trends, customer behavior, data analytics, and organizational change management. This education helps companies and managers:


Strategic Adaptation: Digital transformation education empowers organizations to align their strategies with the opportunities and challenges presented by the digital age. It helps leaders identify potential areas for disruption and develop agile responses to stay ahead of the competition.


Enhanced Customer Experience: Understanding digital transformation enables businesses to design and deliver exceptional customer experiences, which are crucial for customer retention and loyalty in today's customer-centric market.


Data-Driven Decision Making: The course equips managers with skills in data analysis and interpretation, enabling them to make data-driven decisions that lead to improved business outcomes.


Innovation and Creativity: Participants will learn about emerging technologies and innovation processes, fostering a culture of creativity within their organizations and driving continuous improvement.


Organizational Resilience: With digital transformation education, managers can build resilient organizations capable of adapting to disruptions and thriving in times of uncertainty.


Importance of Digital Transformation Education for Building a Career:

In the competitive job market, professionals with expertise in digital transformation are in high demand across various industries. Building a career with a strong foundation in digital transformation can open up numerous opportunities for individuals:


Competitive Advantage: Having a recognized qualification in digital transformation sets job seekers apart from others in the job market, giving them a competitive edge when applying for leadership positions.


Career Progression: As companies prioritize digital transformation to remain competitive, they seek managers and leaders with expertise in this area. Earning an executive diploma in digital transformation can lead to career advancement and promotion.


Versatility: Digital transformation knowledge is valuable across industries, allowing professionals to explore diverse career paths and contribute to different sectors.


High-impact Roles: Graduates can secure roles that involve leading digital transformation initiatives, making strategic decisions, and driving organizational change, thereby playing a crucial role in shaping their company's future.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in business

courseDetails.title: Automated Machine Learning for Beginners (Google & Apple)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn AI: Computer Vision, NLP, Tabular Data - build powerful models with Google AutoML & Apple CreateML
courseDetails.longDescription:
Begin your AI journey with Automated Machine Learning!

This course focuses on giving you the big picture of Artificial Intelligence: the streamlined process of creating AI machine learning models. Leave the mathematical equations and Python coding aside and concentrate on what really matters!


Course Architecture guarantees Best Cognitive Learning Outcomes

Richard Shinn, PhD in AI and CEO of AIBrain, is the Chief Architect behind this course. He designed the entire course structure to help learners acquire cognitive skills; learning by examples first, then learning based on denotational semantics and operational semantics. This two-step approach is particularly useful when we deal with the complexity of real-world problems.


Learn Hands-On

From day 1, you will learn hands-on skills. You will follow our lab instructors to build Machine Learning models with AutoML. By the end of the course, you will be able to build a working AI-powered mobile app. Following Richard Feynman’s principle “What I cannot create, I do not understand” we teach practical knowledge from day one.

Deepen your Skills

To make sure that you will get a deep understanding of all the topics, you will have practical homework assignments accompanying all labs. Each lab has its own homework assignments to help you deepen the skills learned during the course. 

Gain a Certificate from a Leading AI Company

Kick-start your career in AI with an official certificate from a leading AI company! Upon completion of the course, you will be awarded with a verified certificate of completion. 

Complete a Term Project: Build your own ML Model

As part of this course, you will ideate your own AI-powered product that leverages Machine Learning. You will build a simple low-fidelity prototype of an AI-powered application before building a custom Machine Learning model with AutoML for your idea.

Get 1-1 Advice and Guidance

We have lab instructors available for 1-on-1 assistance in case you need help with your homework assignments. Reach out to our lab instructors any time in our AI School Community.

Join the AI School Community

Use our vivid AISchool Community and Discord channel to discuss with your peers and leverage the power of community. Share your questions and answers with lab instructors and fellow students. 

Evaluate your Progress

During your journey, you will always have the possibility to evaluate your progress and understanding of the materials through quizzes. This will help you to constantly measure your success and help to check your understanding of core concepts. 

Build your Professional Network

Stay in touch with your peers and leverage a professional network of like-minded AI practitioners. In our community, we provide a dedicated alumni channel for all successful graduates of our course.




The course takes you through 4 carefully structured topics.

Topic 1

Introduction to Automated Machine Learning

Find out how AutoML is transforming the data science game by enabling anyone to build machine learning models without a single line of code. Familiarize yourself with the 5-Step ML Pipeline to solve any Machine Learning problem, before building your very first AI-powered smartphone application in 30 minutes.


Topic 2

Vision AI with Google AutoML & Apple CreateML

AI can help computers to interpret and understand digital images. In this segment, you will train models that can accurately locate and classify objects.


Topic 3

NLP & Tables with Google AutoML & Apple CreateML

AI can help computers understand text and spoken words just like humans. Use SNS posts and new articles to train models to classify emotion and content.

AI can analyze patterns across data with numerous variables. Use tabular data to predict house prices.


Topic 4

Deploy AI in an Application

Easily deploy models on to your device and test it in real world settings.
targetAudiences: Beginners without any background in programming or computer science
Anyone who wants to automate the Machine Learning process
Students who want to start a career in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
Professionals who want to learn how to apply Machine Learning in their respective jobs
Anyone beginning their journey in Machine Learning

Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.

Course Author:

Cristiana Silva is a senior education technician with 4 years' experience in coordinating pedagogical and social projects in Higher Education Institutions and Private Social Solidarity Institutions. She began her work in an academic environment, where she obtained her Master's Degree in Education, in the specialization area of Adult Education and Community Intervention at the University of Minho and worked as an educational researcher, responsible for designing course curricula and managing course quality assessment processes. She is currently a learning designer at the Polytechnic of Cávado and Ave in Barcelos. With a passion for adult education, she has also been president of the C.R.I.A. Dialogues Association since 2021.


The short course "Research Methodologies" aims to provide an introductory understanding of scientific research in Administration. This course equips students with the necessary skills to design, develop, and evaluate research plans. As future business managers, students should be able to use data collection techniques and instruments to develop or improve business strategies, such as questionnaires, interviews, and document analysis.

At the end of the course, students should be able to:

  • Understand the characteristics of management research.

  • Explain techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data.

  • Write, present, and disseminate scientific work.

  • Understand ethical principles in research.

  • Prepare bibliographical references.


The structure of the search methodologies course:

  • Characteristics and paradigms of management research

  • Techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data

  • Research methodologies

  • Writing, presenting, and disseminating scientific work

  • Ethics in research

  • Bibliographical references


This course lays the foundation for both academic success and effective business management by equipping students with the essential skills to conduct rigorous research and analyze complex information.


1. Scientific Activity and Capstone Project Preparation

  • Research Design: The course empowers students to design robust research studies. This includes formulating clear research questions, selecting appropriate methodologies, and collecting and analyzing data systematically. These skills are crucial for scientific investigations and directly applicable to the Capstone Project, where students are expected to conduct independent research.

  • Critical Thinking and Data Analysis: Students learn to approach information critically, evaluate evidence, and draw sound conclusions. This analytical mindset is essential in science and in crafting a compelling Capstone Project that demonstrates a deep understanding of a chosen topic.

  • Scientific Communication: The course helps students develop effective communication skills, enabling them to present their findings clearly and persuasively, both in written and oral formats. This skill is vital for sharing research results within the scientific community and defending the Capstone Project before a panel.


2. Application in Real Business and Management

  • Informed Decision-Making: In the business world, decisions must be based on solid evidence. The course equips students with the tools to conduct market research, analyze competitor strategies, and evaluate the effectiveness of various business initiatives. This data-driven approach minimizes risks and maximizes opportunities.

  • Problem-Solving: Businesses constantly face challenges. The course teaches students to identify problems, gather relevant data, analyze the root causes, and develop effective solutions. This structured problem-solving approach is invaluable for managers at all levels.

  • Performance Evaluation: The ability to measure and compare results is essential for continuous improvement. The course enables students to track key performance indicators, identify trends, and make data-driven adjustments to optimize business outcomes.

  • Innovation and Adaptation: The business landscape is constantly evolving. The course fosters a mindset of curiosity and inquiry, encouraging students to stay abreast of new developments, conduct research, and adapt their strategies to remain competitive.


"Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies" provides students with a versatile skillset that is crucial for both academic and professional success. By emphasizing rigorous research, critical thinking, and effective communication, the course empowers students to make informed decisions, solve complex problems, and drive innovation in the dynamic world of business.

A pitch deck is a concise and visually engaging presentation that is typically used in business settings to convey a company's or project's key information, value proposition, and investment opportunity. Pitch decks are primarily used when seeking investments, partnerships, or to secure new clients. They serve as a persuasive tool to convey the essence of your business or idea quickly and effectively. A well-crafted pitch deck can make a significant difference in the success of a business, startup, or project.

Here are the key components and the needs of usage for a pitch deck in a business context:

  1. Introduction: Start with a compelling introduction that grabs the audience's attention and provides an overview of your business or project.

  2. Problem Statement: Clearly define the problem or need that your product or service addresses. This sets the stage for why your business is relevant.

  3. Solution: Present your solution and how it addresses the identified problem. Explain how your product or service works and what makes it unique.

  4. Market Opportunity: Describe the market size and potential for your business. This includes the target audience and its demographics.

  5. Business Model: Explain how your business will generate revenue, your pricing strategy, and the sales channels you plan to use.

  6. Traction: Showcase any significant achievements, customer testimonials, or partnerships to build credibility.

  7. Competitive Analysis: Identify your competitors and explain how your business is positioned relative to them. Highlight your competitive advantages.

  8. Team: Introduce your team and their relevant experience. This builds trust and confidence in your ability to execute the business plan.

  9. Financial Projections: Present your financial forecasts, including revenue, expenses, and profitability projections. This demonstrates the potential for a return on investment.

  10. Ask: Clearly state what you are seeking from your audience, whether it's investment, partnership, or something else.


The skills related to pitching, business presenting, and business communication are important for experts and companies for several reasons:

  1. Securing Funding: Effective pitching skills are crucial when seeking investments or funding. A well-presented pitch deck can significantly increase the chances of attracting investors.

  2. Building Credibility: Strong presentation skills can help a company or individual build credibility with clients, partners, and stakeholders. A professional presentation conveys competence and confidence.

  3. Effective Communication: Business communication skills are essential for conveying ideas, plans, and strategies within a company. Clear and persuasive communication can drive team alignment and enhance productivity.

  4. Client Acquisition: In sales and client-facing roles, effective presentation and communication skills can help in acquiring new clients or customers. It can make the difference between a successful pitch and a missed opportunity.

  5. Career Advancement: For individuals, mastering these skills can lead to career advancement. Professionals who can effectively communicate their ideas and lead presentations tend to stand out and progress in their careers.

  6. Team Collaboration: Effective communication and presentation skills are essential for collaboration within teams. They help in conveying objectives, sharing updates, and ensuring everyone is on the same page.


Strong understanding of pitching, business presenting skills, and business communication skills is crucial in today's competitive business environment. These skills not only enable companies to attract investments, win clients, and build credibility but also support the career growth of individuals. A combination of these skills can lead to more successful and impactful business endeavors.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business domains or improve their knowledge.

Product Management

Product Management is a multifaceted discipline that encompasses the planning, development, marketing, and optimization of a product or service throughout its lifecycle. It involves aligning customer needs with business goals and coordinating cross-functional teams to deliver successful and valuable products. Product managers act as the linchpin between various departments, ensuring seamless communication and collaboration.


Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in marketing and business

Bem-vindo ao Curso: Certificado Profissional em Liderança e Gestão


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.  

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação, com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática (Machine Learning), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico e Internet das Coisas.

Autor do curso:

O Dr. Pedro Nunes construiu uma carreira multifacetada, combinando com sucesso o mundo académico com a experiência prática no mundo dos negócios. A sua formação culminou com um Doutoramento em Análise Económica e Estratégia Empresarial, com menção "cum laude", pela Universidade de Santiago de Compostela.

Profissionalmente, o Dr. Nunes navegou por diversos setores, incluindo tecnologia, comércio internacional e consultoria, desempenhando funções que vão desde analista de negócios até diretor. Atualmente, aplica a sua vasta experiência na indústria e os seus conhecimentos académicos como Professor em vários programas de DBA, contribuindo para a formação da próxima geração de profissionais.


Definição e Importância da Gestão

Gestão é o processo de coordenar e supervisionar as atividades de uma organização para alcançar seus objetivos


Envolve planear, organizar, liderar e controlar recursos, incluindo humanos, financeiros e materiais, para garantir

operações eficientes e eficazes.


Elementos-chave da gestão:

  • Planeamento: Definir objetivos e determinar o melhor curso de ação para alcançá-los.

  • Organizar: Organizar recursos e tarefas de forma estruturada para atingir os objetivos.

  • Liderar: Direcionar e motivar as pessoas a trabalharem em prol dos objetivos da organização.

  • Controlo: Monitorizar e avaliar o progresso para garantir que os objetivos são atingidos.


Importância da Gestão:

  • Atingir Metas: A Gestão ajuda as organizações a definir e atingir os seus objetivos, garantindo que todas as atividades estão alinhadas com os resultados desejados.

  • Otimização de recursos: A gestão eficiente garante que os recursos são utilizados de forma eficaz, minimizando o desperdício e maximizando a produtividade.

  • Adaptabilidade e Inovação: As boas práticas de gestão permitem que as organizações se adaptem a ambientes em mudança e fomentem a inovação.

  • Motivação e Desenvolvimento dos Colaboradores: Uma gestão eficaz envolve liderar e motivar os colaboradores, o que aumenta a satisfação no trabalho e o crescimento pessoal.

  • Vantagem competitiva: Práticas de gestão sólidas dão às organizações uma vantagem competitiva, melhorando a eficiência, a produtividade e o desempenho geral.


LIDERANÇA:


Definição geral: A liderança pode ser vista como a arte de motivar um grupo de pessoas a atingir um objetivo comum. Implica não só a gestão de recursos, mas também inspirar e moldar o futuro das organizações.


Âmbito:  A aula abordará os aspectos fundamentais da liderança, incluindo a sua definição, significado e as várias abordagens teóricas que têm sido desenvolvidas ao longo do tempo.


Relevância moderna: A liderança é fundamentalmente uma questão de influência. Envolve a capacidade de um indivíduo para inspirar, motivar e permitir que outros contribuam para a eficácia e o sucesso da organização.


Desafios: No atual ambiente em rápida mudança, marcado pela globalização, avanços tecnológicos e desafios éticos complexos, a liderança torna-se cada vez mais crítica.


A IMPORTÂNCIA DA LIDERANÇA NAS ORGANIZAÇÕES:


Adaptação e mudança: Os líderes eficazes são essenciais para navegar através de mudanças e incertezas, orientando as organizações através de processos de transformação e adaptando-se a novos paradigmas.


Cultura e ética organizacional: Os líderes desempenham um papel crucial na formação da cultura organizacional e na promoção de um clima ético, influenciando o comportamento dos empregados e o ethos organizacional geral.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.  

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação, com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática (Machine Learning), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da IBM, Intel e Microsoft, e membro da Câmara de Comércio e Indústria Portuguesa.

O MTF está presente em 210 países e foi escolhido por mais de 520 000 alunos.


Autor do curso:

O Dr. Pedro Nunes construiu uma carreira multifacetada, combinando com sucesso o mundo académico com a experiência prática no mundo dos negócios. A sua formação culminou com um Doutoramento em Análise Económica e Estratégia Empresarial, com menção "cum laude", pela Universidade de Santiago de Compostela.

Profissionalmente, o Dr. Nunes navegou por diversos setores, incluindo tecnologia, comércio internacional e consultoria, desempenhando funções que vão desde analista de negócios até diretor. Atualmente, aplica a sua vasta experiência na indústria e os seus conhecimentos académicos como Professor em vários programas de DBA, contribuindo para a formação da próxima geração de profissionais.


Definição e Importância da Gestão

Gestão é o processo de coordenar e supervisionar as atividades de uma organização para alcançar seus objetivos


Envolve planear, organizar, liderar e controlar recursos, incluindo humanos, financeiros e materiais, para garantir

operações eficientes e eficazes.


Elementos-chave da gestão:

  • Planeamento: Definir objetivos e determinar o melhor curso de ação para alcançá-los.

  • Organizar: Organizar recursos e tarefas de forma estruturada para atingir os objetivos.

  • Liderar: Direcionar e motivar as pessoas a trabalharem em prol dos objetivos da organização.

  • Controlo: Monitorizar e avaliar o progresso para garantir que os objetivos são atingidos.


Importância da Gestão:

  • Atingir Metas: A Gestão ajuda as organizações a definir e atingir os seus objetivos, garantindo que todas as atividades estão alinhadas com os resultados desejados.

  • Otimização de recursos: A gestão eficiente garante que os recursos são utilizados de forma eficaz, minimizando o desperdício e maximizando a produtividade.

  • Adaptabilidade e Inovação: As boas práticas de gestão permitem que as organizações se adaptem a ambientes em mudança e fomentem a inovação.

  • Motivação e Desenvolvimento dos Colaboradores: Uma gestão eficaz envolve liderar e motivar os colaboradores, o que aumenta a satisfação no trabalho e o crescimento pessoal.

  • Vantagem competitiva: Práticas de gestão sólidas dão às organizações uma vantagem competitiva, melhorando a eficiência, a produtividade e o desempenho geral.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão
